DESCRIPTION: Converts the alphabetic characters in a string to uppercase.
EXAMPLE: <h3>UCase Example</h3> <cfif IsDefined("FORM.sampleText")> <cfif FORM.sampleText is not ""> <p>Your text, <cfoutput>#FORM.sampleText#</cfoutput>, returned in uppercase is <cfoutput>#UCase(FORM.sampleText)#</cfoutput>. <cfelse> <p>Please enter some text. </cfif> </cfif> <form action = "ucase.cfm"> <p>Enter your sample text, and press "submit" to see the text returned in uppercase: <p><input type = "Text" name = "SampleText" value = "sample"> <input type = "Submit" name = "" value = "submit"> </form>

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: A string or a variable that contains one
